pkgmetadata.longdescription:
An elegant set of language bindings to allow you to write native GNOME applications in Java. Works with both traditional Java VMs and also with GCJ, allowing the creation of native Linux executable binaries.
This library comes from the java-gnome project, which in turn is part of the official suite of GNOME language bindings.
These are the Java bindings for the core GNOME libraries (which therefore depends on a fairly complete and modern GNOME installation). If you *do* have GNOME installed, then you probably want to emerge java-gnome - a meta package which in turn depends on the various GNOME libraries which comprise the complete java-gnome language binding suite.
